The creature bursts open in death, spilling a black inky cloud into the water. The sac in which this ink is kept falls free from its body. You can take the
if you wish - note it on your Adventure Sheet. You also find coral jewellery worth about . Nothing else occurs during your foray into the depths, so you return to land. You climb back up the path that leads to the clifftop tor without incident.
